post:
My name is Paul Walsh and I run Freeweb.ie. Freeweb.ie is an Irish based VPS provider with a focus on quality and value. We guarantee satisfaction or refund within 48 hours.

We host with OVH France on hosting grade AMD Opteron 4386, 64GB RAM, 2TB RAID 1 DISK. 500MBits Guaranteed Internet Uplink. DDoS protected through OVH Anti-DDoS Pro system.

Our latest Offer comes with a huge 2GB RAM for just €5 per month. Quarterly and Annual pricing available also.

    2048MB Guaranteed RAM
    50GB Disk Space
    10TB Bandwidth
    2 vCores
    1 IPv4 / 5 IPv6
    500Mbits Uplink / 1Gbps Interface
    €5 per month
    Offer - https://www.freeweb.ie/w/cart.php?a=add&pid=25 
    

Terms - [http://www.freeweb.ie/terms.html](http://www.freeweb.ie/terms.html)

Test Server - [http://test.freeweb.ie/](http://test.freeweb.ie/)

If you have a specific need that you feel we could meet or would like to become a reseller then please let me know.
